attributes.action: remove adverts forcing hard working honest people to go home!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition is to 
REMOVE adverts forcing honest hard working people from eastern europe to go home [80% of people from Poland works, pays full rents in private sector and does jobs unlikely to be taken by British!]
OR create the SAME adverts to all other - including Asian immigrants.

rejection.details: Please contact the Advertising Standards Authority: http://www.asa.org.uk/asa/how_to_complain/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
